name: Alter Ego Messiah
effect: [AUTO](VC)[Generation Break 2](Active if you have two or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):When any locked card is unlocked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.[AUTO](VC):When your G unit [Stride] during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & lock a rear-guard], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, lock it, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn)
flavor: A fairy tale beyond time. It is said that the incarnation of salvation shall spread its wings and guide those who are meant to lead the new world.

name: Alter Ego Messiah
effect: [AUTO](VC)[Generation Break 2](Active if you have two or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):When any locked card is unlocked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.[AUTO](VC):When your G unit [Stride] during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & lock a rear-guard], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, lock it, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn)
flavor: A fairy tale beyond time. It is said that the incarnation of salvation shall spread its wings and guide those who are meant to lead the new world.

name: Awaking Messiah
effect: [AUTO](Soul):When a grade 4 with "Messiah" in its card name is placed on (VC), you may call this card to (RC). If you called a card, [Soul-Charge 1].[AUTO]:When this unit is unlocked during your turn, choose one of your units in the same column as this unit, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: The awakening of a new life, urged on by the light of the morning sun.

name: Awaking Messiah
effect: [AUTO](Soul):When a grade 4 with "Messiah" in its card name is placed on (VC), you may call this card to (RC). If you called a card, [Soul-Charge 1].[AUTO]:When this unit is unlocked during your turn, choose one of your units in the same column as this unit, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: The awakening of a new life, urged on by the light of the morning sun.

name: Asleep Messiah
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "Neon Messiah", draw a card, and you get an "Alter Ego Messiah" crest.
flavor: The origin of a new life, raised within a cradle.

name: Neon Messiah
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: The flickering hope soon became the light that illuminates the world.

name: Astrolabe Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC)[Generation Break 2](Active if you have two or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):During your turn, if any player has a locked card, this unit gets [Power] +10000.[AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand for the cost of [Stride], draw a card.
flavor: It is said that during the age of the gods, two dragon deities fought each other for eons.

name: Astrolabe Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC)[Generation Break 2](Active if you have two or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):During your turn, if any player has a locked card, this unit gets [Power] +10000.[AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand for the cost of [Stride], draw a card.
flavor: It is said that during the age of the gods, two dragon deities fought each other for eons.

name: Kaluzar Klein
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if any player has a locked card, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have an "Alter Ego Messiah" crest, [COST][retire this unit], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with grade equal to or less than your vanguard from among them, put it on an open (RC) as a locked card, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn)
flavor: Over a long period of time, factors of another world have become part of this planet.

name: Kaluzar Klein
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if any player has a locked card, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have an "Alter Ego Messiah" crest, [COST][retire this unit], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with grade equal to or less than your vanguard from among them, put it on an open (RC) as a locked card, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn)
flavor: Over a long period of time, factors of another world have become part of this planet.

name: Arrester Messiah
effect: [AUTO](RC)[Generation Break 1](Active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Messiah" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle, and at the end of that battle, lock this unit. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn)
flavor: They relocated to the cracks of the planet. All to save their beloved child.

name: Arrester Messiah
effect: [AUTO](RC)[Generation Break 1](Active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Messiah" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle, and at the end of that battle, lock this unit. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn)
flavor: They relocated to the cracks of the planet. All to save their beloved child.

name: Flowers in Vacuum, Cosmo Wreath
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: In ancient times, a flower bloomed in space. It carries the will to protect.

name: Flowers in Vacuum, Cosmo Wreath
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: In ancient times, a flower bloomed in space. It carries the will to protect.

name: Destiny Dealer
effect: [CONT](Hand):While you are paying the cost for [Stride], this card may be discarded as a grade 3.[ACT](Hand):If you have an "Alter Ego Messiah" crest, [COST][discard this card], search your deck or drop for up to one grade 3 card with "Messiah" in its card name, reveal it and put it into your hand, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
flavor: In bygone days, the beat of its white wings reached the will of salvation.

name: Destiny Dealer
effect: [CONT](Hand):While you are paying the cost for [Stride], this card may be discarded as a grade 3.[ACT](Hand):If you have an "Alter Ego Messiah" crest, [COST][discard this card], search your deck or drop for up to one grade 3 card with "Messiah" in its card name, reveal it and put it into your hand, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
flavor: In bygone days, the beat of its white wings reached the will of salvation.

name: Sacrifice Messiah
effect: [AUTO](RC)[Generation Break 1](Active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you have a vanguard with "Messiah" in its card name, [COST][lock this unit], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Then, if you have no face up cards in your damage zone, [Counter-Charge 1]. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn)
flavor: The hand of salvation was extended to us. For the future that connects to the present.

name: Sacrifice Messiah
effect: [AUTO](RC)[Generation Break 1](Active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you have a vanguard with "Messiah" in its card name, [COST][lock this unit], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Then, if you have no face up cards in your damage zone, [Counter-Charge 1]. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn)
flavor: The hand of salvation was extended to us. For the future that connects to the present.

name: Herbig Claw
effect: [CONT](GC):If you have a vanguard with "Messiah" in its card name, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.[AUTO](RC):When your other unit is unlocked, you may put this unit into your soul.
flavor: It is said that the dragon of creation that had once descended on this plane, rewrote the laws of the world and bestowed upon us the new blessing known as "magic".

name: Herbig Claw
effect: [CONT](GC):If you have a vanguard with "Messiah" in its card name, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.[AUTO](RC):When your other unit is unlocked, you may put this unit into your soul.
flavor: It is said that the dragon of creation that had once descended on this plane, rewrote the laws of the world and bestowed upon us the new blessing known as "magic".

name: Star Dragon Deity of Infinitude, Eldobreath
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Double the [Power] and [Critical] of all of your front row units until end of turn! (Increase to double its [Power] and [Critical] when activated)
flavor: Among the stars rests endless hope. Infinite power shall bring about salvation.

name: Star Agression Dragon
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: The end of life is inevitable; that is why we seek salvation.

name: Aberrant Gleam Dragon
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Let's unravel the records of the heroes from their time.

name: Transforming Heavy Machinery, Heavy Constalion
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Trials are meant to be overcome.

name: Alter Rate Sphere Dragon
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)
flavor: Those who are against creation shall perish. What kind of future will the world choose?

name: Genesis Dragon, Excelics Messiah
effect: (This card cannot be in your main deck)[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Discard a grade 3 card with "Messiah" in its card name from hand], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down. (When you stride, your original vanguard becomes a heart card, and this unit gets that card's [Power] and card name. At the end of the turn, return this unit face up)[AUTO](VC)[Generation Break 2]:When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose any number of any player's locked cards, and unlock them. If you unlocked a card, choose the same number of your rear-guards as the number of cards unlocked by this ability, [Stand] them, and until the end of turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000, and this unit gets [Critical] +1.
flavor: Thus, the light of creation cleansed all sins and paved the path towards paradise.

name: Genesis Dragon, Excelics Messiah
effect: [Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Discard a grade 3 card with "Messiah" in its card name from hand], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down. [AUTO](VC)[Generation Break 2]:When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose any number of any player's locked cards, and unlock them. If you unlocked a card, choose the same number of your rear-guards as the number of cards unlocked by this ability, [Stand] them, and until the end of turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000, and this unit gets [Critical] +1.

name: Genesis Dragon, Amnesty Messiah
effect: (This card cannot be in your main deck)[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards from hand with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater, and discard them], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down. (When you stride, your original vanguard becomes a heart card, and this unit gets that card's [Power] and card name. At the end of the turn, return this unit face up)[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & turn a card from G zone face up], choose any number of any player's locked cards, and unlock them. Choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each card unlocked by this ability.
flavor: The will to struggle against destiny itself is the power that can grasp the fate of the world.

name: Genesis Dragon, Amnesty Messiah
effect: [Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards from hand with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater, and discard them], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & turn a card from G zone face up], choose any number of any player's locked cards, and unlock them. Choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each card unlocked by this ability.

name: Alter Ego Messiah
effect: [CONT]:You can perform [Stride], and cannot ride grade 3 or greater cards without "Messiah" in their card names.[CONT]:The original [Power] of your grade 3 cards with "Messiah" in their card names become 13000. (Including heart cards)[CONT]:During your turn, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Messiah" in its card name, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 for each face up card in your G zone.[AUTO]:At the end of your turn, unlock all of your opponent's locked cards, and bind those units.

name: Alter Ego Messiah
effect: [CONT]:You can perform [Stride], and cannot ride grade 3 or greater cards without "Messiah" in their card names.[CONT]:The original [Power] of your grade 3 cards with "Messiah" in their card names become 13000.[CONT]:During your turn, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Messiah" in its card name, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 for each face up card in your G zone.[AUTO]:At the end of your turn, unlock all of your opponent's locked cards, and bind those units.
